packages.name: MavensMate
packages.description: MavensMate for Sublime Text is a plugin that aims to replicate the functionality of the Eclipse-based Force.com IDE.
packages.author: joeferraro

osx.release_notes:
New "Apex Scripts" functionality enables you to create & run named scripts within Sublime Text, more code assist enhancements based on Tooling API.

(OSX USERS: please update MM.app and MM for ST plugin)
